column6:
The pressure builds on Black Bolt. The hawks in the Inhumans council are calling for all-out war and as he struggles to make his fateful decision, Black Bolt finds himself betrayed. As if that weren¹t enough, a terrible secret from his past is revealed. It's enough to make a man scream.,2007,4
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
